metadata.title: Magic of Andre Rieu
description: 2010 two CD collection. Andre Rieu - the Waltz King - has legions of fans worldwide and his performances have become major events and are always guaranteed to sell out. He tours Europe and the USA constantly and has also toured Australia and the Far East regularly. Although often criticized by purists, there is no doubting his popular appeal or the fact that he has introduced light classical music to millions worldwide. This has been indicated not only by the number of platinum selling albums he has sold but also by the honors that have been bestowed upon him. 29 tracks
